content.question: In the circuits shown, all resistors have the same resistance <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and all capacitors have the same capacitance <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following circuits will have the same time constant as the circuit shown in the figure above?

choices.label: The figure shows a circuit with one battery, two resistors, and two capacitors. The left vertical branch has a battery with e m f epsilon. The right vertical branch has two capacitors connected in parallel, each with capacitance C. The top horizontal branch has two resistors connected in parallel, each with resistance R.

content.answer: The figure shows a circuit with one battery, two resistors, and two capacitors. The left vertical branch has a battery with e m f epsilon.
